# StringConverterRegistry.getConverter method

Returns the converter registered for this class type. If no converter for this type is registered, the ObjectConverter is returned.

```csharp
public IGenericValueConverter<string> getConverter(Type classType)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| classType | The class type |
